name: CEFALEXIN
cautions: Cautions see under Cefaclor; interactions: Appendix 1 (cephalosporins)
doses:
250 mg every 6 hours or 500 mg every
8–12 hours increased to 1–1.5 g every 6–8 hours for severe infections; child 25 mg/kg daily in divided doses, doubled for
severe infections, max. 100 mg/kg daily; or under
1 year 125 mg every 12 hours, 1–5 years 125 mg every 8 hours, 5–12
years 250 mg every 8 hours
Prophylaxis of recurrent urinary-tract infection, adult 125 mg at night
